t: Flat River Group Acquires Optimum Fulfillment to Bolster Toy, Game Distribution - The Toy Book
s: November 12, 2020 - Michigan-based Flat River Group LLC expands its footprint in toys and games with its acquisition of Optimum Fulfillment LLC. Based in Peru, Illinois, Optimum Fulfillment services the e-commerce industry as a wholesale distributor of toys, games, and other consumer products.
